long_desc: Someone's little pet dragon has gotten loose, and is sniffing about here.
flags_raw: Awwww... how cute!  A little baby dragon.  He's about 3 feet long and you
stats1_raw: just want to cuddle him to death... no, you really want to kill him to tell
stats2_raw: the truth.  But, remember, even a little dragon can be a big problem.
